segments.text: I had meetings back to back all morning . And phone rang off the hook from the minute I walked into the office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not a good day . I hate to tell you that Mr . Thomas wants to see the profit ’ s statement for new project tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t believe it . I guess I ’ ll be here until 10 again tonight .
segments.speaker: S2
